altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken (Fan Colored)

description.en: This is the fan colored version of Manga Adaptation of That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime.

title.en: Tensura Nikki: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.en: The Slime Diaries: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura Nikki Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転スラ日記 転生したらスライムだった件

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based on Volumes 3,4 and 5 of the Light Novel.

"Dear diary… I got reincarnated as a slime."

Even in another world, lives aren't always on the line. There's plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play ...and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives.
description.it: Questa è la serie spin-off ufficiale 4-koma di "Vita da slime"! A differenza della storia principale, questa vede la vita quotidiana di Limur da una nuova prospettiva!
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff tiene contenido basado de los Volumenes 3,4, y 5 de la Novela Ligera.

"Querido diario... me reencarne como un slime."

Incluso en otro mundo, las vidas no siempre estan en la linea. Hay mucho trabajo que hacer, desde alimentar a la comunidad y forjar los items que necesitan; como tambien hay un monton de juego... ¡Y travesuras!. Unete a Rimuru y sus amigos mientras que se relajan y disfrutan de sus vidas diarias.

title.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as Kosaku Shima

altTitles.es: Aquella vez que reencarné en Shima Kosaku

altTitles.en: Regarding Reincarnated to Kosaku Shima

altTitles.ja: 転生したら島耕作だった件

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Shima Kosaku Datta Ken

description.en:
Mikami Satoru, 37 years old, virgin, was stabbed to death. When he wakes up, he'll be reincarnated as a slime — except not, he was reincarnated as [Shima Kosaku]!?  
  
What would happen if the protagonist of the [Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken] was reincarnated as [Shima Kosaku] instead of a slime!?  
  
This special edition release lets you read and compare the original materials of [Shima Kosaku] and [Tensura] that appears in this ultimate imagining, extremely most-discussed book [Tensei Shitara Shima Kosaku] .  
  
Takes place between Chapters 5 & 6 from [Kachou Shima Kosaku] and chapter 1 from [Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken].

altTitles.ja-ro: Mob Boukensha to Tanoshii Kouryuu o Shite Mita Ken

altTitles.ja: モブ冒険者とたのしい交流をしてみた件

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken - That Time I Got Reincarnated in a Thin Book! "Even though I was a nearly 40 year old man, I still came like a girl..." (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 転生したら薄い本になった件 「アラフォーのおっさんなのに女の子みたいにイカされるなんてっ…」

title.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime - Tensura Short Stories

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم - قصص قصيرة

description.en:
A collection of short side stories taking place in the world of Tensura

---------

The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice. He had been reincarnated into a slime!

While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

title.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Love Electronica

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Электронные любовные неприятности

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Koiwazurai Electronica

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: 恋煩いエレクトロニカ

title.en: Tenchura! Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenchura! Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転ちゅら！ 転生したらスライムだった件

description.en:
This spinoff manga starts from the end of Volume 1 of Light Novel, although its more like a parody.

After an encounter with Shizu-san, Rimuru learns the art of mimicking humans. However, his appearance was somehow changed to that of a three-year-old...! The smaller Rimuru is, the more mischievous and troublesome he becomes! The monsters in the Jura Forest can't help but pamper him!
description.es-la:
Este es un Spinoff parodia de la franquicia de Tensura, comenzando en el final del Volumen 1 de la Novela Ligera.

Después de un encuentro con Shizu, Rimuru aprende la habilidad de imitar a los humanos. ¡Sin embargo, su apariencia cambió de alguna manera a la de un niño de tres años...! ¡Cuánto más pequeño es Rimuru, más travieso y problemático se vuelve! ¡Los monstruos del Bosque de Jura no pueden evitar mimarlo!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime datta Ken - Especially Dense Tempest Magicules! (Doujinshi)

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en:
Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?

A new spin-off "Tensura" manga written by the original author Fuse himself!
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff Manga has spoilers starting from Volume 9 of the Light Novel.

With all its innovations, the kingdom of Tempest-founded by the demon lord Rimuru-is a veritable paradise for travelers such as Framea, the rabbitfolk chief's daughter. Framea has always had a nose for adventure, an inquisitive mind, and a knack for discovering and identifying the latest and greatest the world has to offer! Her notepad is open at all times, ready for any three-star delights she may encounter, so when Rimuru himself gives Framea a mission to catalog the area's attractions, she'll have her work cut out for her-and tons of stars to hand out!

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件 美食伝　～ペコとリムルの料理手帖～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura: Bishokuden - Peko to Rimuru no Ryori Techo

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Gourmet Story - Peko and Rimuru's Cooking Book

description.en:
A wounded goblin warrior was given a mission by Rimuru along with his name... that is, "to make everyone full"!?

The stage shifts from the battlefield to the kitchen, and a new challenge for the novice chef, Peko, begins...!!

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم: الثلاثي في تيمبيست

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based on Volumes 4,5,6 and 7 of the Light Novel.

Against the odds, the little slime Rimuru has established Tempest, his magical country for all monsters, and it’s thriving. Three visitors, Phos the fox girl, Stella the dragon girl, and Nemu the winged girl, come to pay Tempest a visit, and they’re stunned at just how quickly it’s developed.

title.en: Tensei Shite mo Shachiku Datta Ken

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated (Again!) as a Workaholic Slime

altTitles.ja: 転生しても社畜だった件

description.en:
Being reincarnated as a slime into a fantasy world is one thing...but being reincarnated as a slime back into corporate life?? What could be more hellish? Not to mention the rest of the Slime fantasy crew are working at the company...for better or worse, Rimuru is back in business!


---

  
**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/sizuku0701)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/593856)

altTitles.en: Shuna wants Rimuru-sama's children!

altTitles.ja: シュナはリムル様の子供が欲しいのです!

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件　番外編～『とある休暇の過ごし方』～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Extra Story - How to Spend a Certain Vacation

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Дополнительная история - как провести отпуск

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.

In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en:
Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?

A new spin-off "Tensura" manga written by the original author Fuse himself!
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

title.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime - Tensura Short Stories

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم - قصص قصيرة

description.en:
A collection of short side stories taking place in the world of Tensura

---------

The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice. He had been reincarnated into a slime!

While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Bishokuden - Peko to Rimuru no Ryori Techo

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件 美食伝　～ペコとリムルの料理手帖～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura: Bishokuden - Peko to Rimuru no Ryori Techo

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Gourmet Story - Peko and Rimuru's Cooking Book

description.en:
A wounded goblin warrior was given a mission by Rimuru along with his name... that is, "to make everyone full"!?

The stage shifts from the battlefield to the kitchen, and a new challenge for the novice chef, Peko, begins...!!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件　番外編～『とある休暇の過ごし方』～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Extra Story - How to Spend a Certain Vacation

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Дополнительная история - как провести отпуск

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.
